NajaH:::

Najah followed at Zardus quickly as he could and come
in in Alliance's base.


--- Yanshosh@... wrote:
> Yesss.. THat I can do..
> 
> ::Zardus/WatMachine::
> 
> WarMachine laughs, watching the Mafia retreat. He
> turns around, 
> hearing Zardus' voice on his comm.
> 
> "Return to base," Zardus told him over the comm, "I
> will need some 
> big bots' help soon."
> 
> WarMachine takes off after Zardus, the huge gestalt
> taking giant 
> strides.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Zardus looks back to make sure Najah was following,
> landing at the 
> Alliance base.
> 
> "Shields up," he says, entering the base and heading
> for the bridge. 
> He looks down at his wrist comp and taps a few
> buttons.
> 
> Back near Portugal, the Iron Fist launches four
> shuttles, sending 
> them toward the Alliance base.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "RYO D"
> <striderzero1@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Just one request make sure Zardus is at the
> base also give all 
> you got 
> > so there are no question about this battle.
> 
>
